column4: i cant believe this...this is amazing...and ironic at the same time......all this years i had so much problem trying to plug my ipod on linux....and now that i get ubuntu it is so easy......but the ironic part is...now the basics wont work.....SOUND and WIRELESS.....shit :(
i dont know why the sound wont work......when i try to play something....i can see it playing it....but i cant hear shit :(
yes nalioth ok, virgule what mixer?
